resources.string: To improve your browsing experience, we recommend you to share the content you are browsing. This will require Bluetooth connectivity. Do you want to turn Bluetooth on?
This application requires WiFi connection. Please select a network:
Tell people that I have webpages to share
Do not tell people that I have webpages to share
Sharing improves your browsing experience using Bluetooth. Sharing therefore requires Bluetooth to be enabled.
The application requires a Name Resolution Service (NRS) to work. For this to be available, you need to be connected to the Wi-Fi network providing it.
When you upload the web pages that you have browsed, other users can download them faster. Turn on or off this option in the settings menu.
The Name Resolution Service (NRS) is required for the application to work. You can change the connection to a new NRS in the settings menu.
